speaker: COMMANDER FABIUS
dialog: Hunter, we've received reports that a Rathalos has been running rampant in the Windward Plains, terrorizing the local villagers. On behalf of the Guild, I am assigning you to take it down. Prepare to depart immediately.

speaker: Narrator
dialog: You leave the base camp, searching for tracks. You start your search in the plains, where you spot a footprint.

speaker: Narrator
dialog: The monster's tracks lead you to the dunes. You can hear its distinctive roar in the distance.

speaker: COMMANDER FABIUS
dialog: We've found it. Time to get to work.
